channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside number 6, 17th November
item.description:
The streetlight is not on when the rest are - i assume it is broken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Eldon Grove, Belsize Park, Hampstead, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in community garden, 17th November
item.description:
Scaffolding and a concrete (?)plant pot have been dumped in the small community garden at the corner of Vanbrugh Hill and Dinsdale Road. A few days ago. Please remove - there's a risk that if people see this they will start treating this space as a dump which will give you more work! Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dinsdale Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tippng Cathay House, 17th November
item.description:
Someone has left some bulky rubbish next to the refuge bin at the bottom of the rubbish chute, ground floor of 18 - 24 Cathay House, see photo. There is also a small chest of drawers by the entrance gate, see photo. And I see there is a computer monitor on the floor underneath the recycling bin of flats 9 - 17 and a large metal lamp? next to the entrance gate of flats 1 - 8. Also a wooden head board has been dumped on Cathay House opposite flats 1 - 8..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cathay Street, Bermondsey, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 17th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: Long Street and Waterson Street really filthy, 17th November
item.description:
Dumped sofa at the rear of Tescos on Long St. Piles of rubbish around the Lime and Voi bike stand on Long St. This has been reported to Lime but no response Opened bags of rubbish in 2 piles on Waterson St. Long St. hasn’t been cleaned for ages.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Long Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Exposed Electrics on Street Light Post, 17th November
item.description:
The access panel on lamppost 18P0652 is missing and the electrics are exposed. Can you please replace the missing access panel. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Griffin Road, Plumstead
